backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, builder sessions with messages, and CRUD logic for ranked opportunities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence record describing a homepage hero layout change and its associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing styling, routing, pages, components, and data hooks.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, inputs, charts, and layout tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React mount node and main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster inside a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Responsive shell with sticky header, navigation (including AI App Builder), mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/auth/BuilderLogi: Renders a login gate prompting users to authenticate via Internet Identity before accessing the builder.
frontend/src/components/BrowseFiltersBar: Filter bar component providing location, category, barrier, and sort controls with clear-all functionality.
frontend/src/components/builder/BuilderS: Provides the layout for the builder interface, including sessions panel, transcript area, and composer.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatComp: Handles message input and submission for the builder chat, including validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/builder/ChatTran: Displays chat messages with auto-scrolling, loading skeletons, and empty-state prompts.
frontend/src/components/builder/ProfileS: Shows a dialog to collect and save the user's name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/builder/Sessions: Lists builder sessions, allows creating new ones, and highlights the active session.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedOpportun: Loads and displays featured opportunities with loading skeletons, error state, and a grid of cards.
Displays an opportunity card with title, company, badges, score, and action buttons, with optional featured styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderMessages.ts: Fetches and appends builder chat messages for a given session using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuilderSessions.ts: Loads user builder sessions and provides a mutation to create new sessions.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves and saves the current user's profile through the actor, managing loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnsureXerisFeature: Ensures a specific featured opportunity exists by calling a backend initializer once.
frontend/src/hooks/useFeaturedOpportunit: Defines a React Query hook that fetches featured opportunities using the actor API when available.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and auth state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Provides a React Query hook to fetch filtered opportunity lists from the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunity.ts: Fetches a single opportunity by ID using React Query and the actor API.
Defines a mutation hook to submit a new opportunity and invalidate related queries on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables, typography, and custom utilities like gradients and text glow.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page describing SIDEHUSL's mission, workflow, and value using styled sections and cards.
frontend/src/pages/BrowsePage.tsx: Implements the browse page with filters, URL sync, featured section, and sorted opportunity listings.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: Implements the authenticated builder interface with sessions, messages, profile setup, and AI-assisted chat.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and navigation buttons to builder and browse pages.
frontend/src/pages/OpportunityDetailsPag: Displays detailed information for a single opportunity with loading, error handling, and navigation back to browse.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitOpportunityPage: Form page allowing users to submit new opportunities with validation and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/utils/builderAssistant.ts: Rule‑based generator that analyzes a prompt and produces a deterministic app plan with pages, features, and data models.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, including version info, a rebrand summary, and a list of existing implemented features. It outlines completed functionality and indicates the project is in a fix-request state.
